text: "Nur in meinem Kopf" () is a song by German recording artist Andreas Bourani. It was written by Bourani along with Tom Olbrich and Julius Hartog for his debut album Staub & Fantasie (2011), while production was helmed by Andreas Herbig and Peter "Jem" Seifert. Released as Bourani's first single in May 2011, the song became an instant commercial success, reaching the top 20 in Austria, Germany, and Switzerland. ==Formats and track listings== ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !align="center"|Chart (2011) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable" !Chart (2011) !Position |- |Germany (Official German Charts) |align="center"|58 |} ==References== Category:2011 singles Category:Andreas Bourani songs Category:2011 songs Category:Universal Music Group singles Category:Songs written by Andreas Bourani
title: Nur in meinem Kopf
